talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Master Warrior Pedro$
You've been wandering around a lot, so did you find something good?
Little Cidel has been training with determined look in her eyes....
You shouldn't be back of her.
<html>$Ordeal and answer$</html>

${user_nick}$
(Let Master Warrior Pedro know about specialization.)
<html>$Ordeal and answer$</html>

$Master Warrior Pedro$
I heard that you were wandering around Riverwort Wharf, so did you find any good ways to discipline? There's a rumor that you shouted to the sky, so are you okay?
* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

$Velskud$
...You need to decide where to go by yourself.
If you are too young to decide it, don't ever think about traveling.

$Geraint$
It's you.
Did you find... the way to go?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What should I do grabbing this sword?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint's voice$
It is definitely you. {user_nick}.
...It is amazing that I could recognize that you're coming as soon as I heard your footstep.

$Geraint's voice$
This black shadow is mine.
If you are strong enough, you can get into the shadow .

$Geraint's voice$
Yes. You can't know what you're supposed to meet in the shadow.
You aren't me but, don't close your eyes whatever you see.

$Geraint's voice$
Tenacity, weakness, courage and fear are mixed up in your mind.
How to act? You need to understand that the answers can be found only in your mind.

$Geraint's voice$
Just remember that one who knows limitations will overcome them, and one who feels fear will defeat it too.

$Geraint's voice$
This is all I can tell you.
So, grab the sword my ex-companion, human.

$Geraint's voice$
You'd better enhance your independence.
...I don't have any idea how to get to here.

* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

$Geraint's voice$
So, grab the sword.
It depends on how much you have confident will.

$Geraint's voice$
You're not enough to maintain the strong will.
Take more time to train yourself with the sword.

* You can get Last Ordeal when you get to level 45.

$Geraint's voice$
So, grab the sword my friend.
It depends on how much you have confident will.

$Geraint$
You look surprised. I'm just a phantom into your memory.
Even if this is broken apart, your memory will exist forever.

$Geraint$
...Choose to the way to go is totally up to you.
Are you ready for that? {user_nick}.

$Geraint$
To maximize your potential power, you need to take and give up some parts.
You can't walk on different ways at the same time, life is that so.

$Geraint$
I'm going to explain more details to you.
If you choose one, you should give up others.

$Geraint$
What you can choose is Gladiator, MoonLord.
First, Gladiatoris succeeded by sword-master's physical attack skills. This is specialized in powerful repeated heating and conversion actions.

$Geraint$
MoonLordis succeeded by sword-master's spell attack skills. This is specialized in fast, long-distance attack and sub-skills so it will be good for long-distance dealers.

$Geraint$
The shape and appearance of black shadow will change up to your decision.
Which way are you going for?

$Geraint$
Choice is totally up to you. Make a decision carefully.
Believe yourself.

$Geraint$
What you can choose is Barbarianor Destroyer. First, Barbarianis specialized in utilizing axes so you can attack enemies using turning force in a wide-range area at the same time.

$Geraint$
Destroyeris specialized in utilizing blunts, self-defense and super-armour destructive power. In case of a head-to-head battle, this position will be beneficial for companies because this can endure enemies' attacking and make opportunities for companies to attack them.

$Geraint$
The shape and appearance of black shadow will change up to your decision.
Which way are you going for?

$Geraint$
There are now two options before you: Mystic Knight or Grand Master. The Mystic Knight can awaken the Ego Sword and transcend the limitations of swordsmanship while summoning fantastical beings to destroy enemies.

$Geraint$
The Grand Master freely uses various weapons with the aid of magical apparitions. One cannot stop watching such splendor.

$Geraint$
The shape and appearance of the Black Shadow will change based on your decision.
Which path will you take?

$Geraint$
Temporarily, I gave you new skills into your body.
Press [K] button to check skills and test them.

$Geraint$
You decided it yourself. Check your potential powers by yourself and beat theshadow.
The battlefield is waiting for you.

$Geraint$
Can you feel potential powers inside of you?

$Geraint$
Yes. The power can be achieved depending on your choice.
However, there's also another way. Choice is totally up to you.

$Geraint$
Considering is not a waste of time. Don't be hesitate.
You want to choose it again? Which way are you going for?

$Geraint$
Considering is not a waste of time. Don't be hesitate.
You want to choose it again? Which way are you going for?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Geraint stares at me with a warm look)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Okay. You look already settled.
Naming to the way you're going to choose is non of my business so get back to humans' land.

$Geraint$
The man with sincere courage can walk on his own way. So don't be fascinated by the shadow but keep going on your way.
I'll always hope that your decision is right.

$Geraint$
You decided it yourself. Check your potential powers by yourself and beat theshadow.
The battlefield is waiting for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I shall walk the path of the Mystic Knight.</html>
<html>I shall walk the path of the Grand Master.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It is wise to give this some thought. This is not something that should be taken lightly.
Are you ready to choose? Which path will you take?

$Geraint$
I don't know. I'm not a prophet.
But if there is 'maybe', I hope that I maybe meet you again.
...So, it's time to say goodbye my friend.

$Geraint$
Only the one with real courage can choose his own path. So don't be caught up by your shadows, and keep going the path you've taken.
I hope you will make the right choices in your journey ahead.

$Geraint$
I don't know. I'm not the Prophet.
But I hope we can meet again.
…Farewell, my friend.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It looks like he was staring at me)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Better than before.
At least I found out the fact that you can use your brain.

$Velskud$
But you have still unnecessary movements. If you really want to overcome Barnac, you should train and train without a break.
Well, even if you will do that, you can't overcome him.

$Velskud$
What if you can overcome him? Is there a difference?

$Velskud$
What if you meet Barnac and then? You meet your father and then? ...What are you going to do next? So you should choose the way you will go on. Don't fix your goal with the old saying. Don't be silly.

$Velskud$
...I said too much.
Now go back.

$Velskud$
...I don't have a duty to answer that.
(Go back and talk with Master Warrior Pedro)

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Huh?! I couldn't notice you. I thought you were wandering around here... but you suddenly!! look different!

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Do you decide the way you should go?
I think you're already qualified.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
3rd job changing. I was wondering why didn't you change the new job.
I just let you consider more deeply because you're young! Hahah!

$Master Warrior Pedro$
So, what you're going to choose?
Just be frank with me. I'm going to watch while choosing the way you should go.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
So, what you're going to choose?
Just be frank with me. I'm going to watch while choosing the way you should go.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Huh? You didn't decide yet? Well~ it's an important work so take more time.
If you need something to ask, just tell me.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Gladiator ?! Oh, it sounds good! It looks quite fit to you!!

* If you change the job, you can't set it back.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Moonlord ?! Oh, it sounds good! It looks quite fit to you!!

* If you change the job, you can't set it back.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Barbarian ?! Oh, it sounds good! It looks quite fit to you!!

* If you change the job, you can't set it back.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Destroyer ?! Oh, it sounds good! It looks quite fit to you!!

* If you change the job, you can't set it back.
<html>$[Specialization] Gladiator$</html>
<html>$[Specialization] Moonlord$</html>
<html>$[Specialization] Barbarian$</html>
<html>$[Specialization] Destroyer$</html>

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Keep working on it. You will be much better than now.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

${user_class}$

*Specialization completed.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
So, what you're going to choose?
Just be frank with me. I'm going to watch while choosing the way you should go.

$Master Warrior Pedro$
Mystic Knight?! Excellent decision!!! It suits you perfectly.

*Once selected, a job change decision cannot be reversed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Uh, actually I need a little more time to think…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Pedro$
Grand Master?! Excellent decision!!! It suits you perfectly.

*Once selected, a job change decision cannot be reversed.
<html>$[Specialization] Mystic Knight</html>
<html>$[Specialization] Grand Master</html>

journal.title: Beginning of ordeal
journal.contents:
I think there was Geraint's sword fixed at Riverwort Wharf. Let's go there.

* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

Riverwort Wharf → Geraint's sword
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Geraint's sword at Riverwort Wharf

journal.title: At the Dimensional Gap
journal.contents:
Talk to Geraint's sword and get into the sword at Riverwort Wharf.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

 Riverwort Wharf (Geraint's sword) →Dimensional Gap (Geraint)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Geraint at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Dimensional Gap and talk with Geraint

journal.title: Shadow
journal.contents: <html>Fight against your own shadow deep inside the Dimensional Gap.</html>
journal.destination: (Solo) Fight against the shadow at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Fight against your own shadow deep inside the Dimensional Gap.

journal.title: The potential power
journal.contents:
Talk with Geraint at the Dimensional Gap.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Geraint's sword) → Dimensional Gap (Geraint)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Geraint at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Geraint at the Dimensional Gap

journal.title: Unexpected meeting
journal.contents:
There is no Geraint's sword but is Velskud standing alone. Let's talk with him.

Riverwort Wharf → Velskud
journal.destination: Talk with Velskud at Riverwort Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Velskud at Riverwort Wharf

journal.title: Choice
journal.contents:
Talk about which way you chose with Master Warrior Pedro.

Lotus Marsh → Master Warrior Pedro
